pageProduct.name: Alpha Keri Super Hydrating Body Cleanser 1 Litre
pageProduct.description:
General Information

A creamy moisturising body wash formulated to create a light lather to gently cleanse skin. Super hydrating to replenish moisture levels and preserves the skins natural oils. Enjoy nourished, supple and healthy skin that hydrates continuously and wear your skin with pride.
 
Skin soothing & nourishing suitable for all skin types including:
• Normal, dry & very dry
• Sensitive
• Dermatitis & Eczema prone skin
• Ideal for baby & infants
 
Advanced skincare technology formulation:
• Lanolin Hydro Technology – 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin – Hydrate, Restore & Protect
o Soap free
o Fragrance & colour free
o Dermatologically tested
o pH balanced

Lanolin Hydro Technology - 3-way action transforms moisture sapped, tight & dry parched skin.
? Uber-moisturising super-hydrator lanolin carries 200% of its weight in water to infuse the skin with moisture. 
? Restore the skin lipids by assisting their function to hold moisture within the skin.
? Protect with a barrier on the skins surface locking moisture in and irritants out.

Warnings

Store below 30°C.
Recycable
External Use Only

Common Uses

Moisturising Body Cleanser

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Disodium Laureth Sulfosuccinate,Disodium Cocoamphodiacetate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Myristamide DIPA, Glycol Stearate,Ceteareth-20, Lanolin, PEG-150 Distearate, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate,Disodium EDTA.

Directions

Apply to wet skin and lather gently. Rinse. Soap free for daily use.  For best results use in conjunction with Alpha Keri oil & moisturises.
